sqls.sql: SELECT id, profile_name, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt FROM profile
SELECT id, execute_sql, execute_result, profile_id, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status FROM store
INSERT INTO store (execute_sql, execute_result, profile_id, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT id, execute_sql, execute_result, profile_id, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status FROM store where id = ?
select run_count from store where id = ?
UPDATE store SET execute_result = ?, run_count = ? where id = ?
